Author: stinkycrumbs
Text: There is a really good chance that your electrolytes are out of balance (particularly potassium which is critical for heart functioning). People with EDs die suddenly from cardiac arrest A LOT due to low potassium. Go to the doctor!!! Ask them to draw a metabolic panel and check your electrolytes (chloride and sodium may be low as well).  Long time ED victim/Nurse right here so I know what Iâ€™m talking about ğŸ¤·ğŸ¼â€â™€ï¸ lol
